document.full_text: major flooding continued along the passaic river in northern new jersey on sunday after the river crested at little falls nearly 5 feet above flood stage late on saturday, meteorologists said.
document.title: new jersey floodwaters crest, 2,000 homes evacuated
lines_and_colors: major flooding continued along the passaic river in northern new jersey on sunday after the river crested at little falls nearly 5 feet above flood stage late on saturday, meteorologists said.
